attributes.action: Ban anyone born in Scotland, wales or Ireland from being Prime Minister of Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is abhorrant that some one with two votes i.e his and his ex bosses is M of this great Island, the time has come for democracy to vote! My personal belief is that the last brave scots died with William Wallace! Fall on your sword Gordon and let the rest of us get on without your brand of bungling!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
